set.name: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Volume 2

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Mana Drive 2 (Jokers): When you put this creature, if you have 2 or more cards in your mana zone and at least one of them is Jokers, put a Jokers from your graveyard into your mana zone. (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Volume 2

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Volume 2

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature is destroyed, draw a card.

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Volume 2

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Choose 2 from among them and put them into your graveyard. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Volume 2

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures and choose an aura from your graveyard. If that aura costs less than the destroyed creature, put it into the battle zone. If it doesn't, put it into your hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Volume 2
